basics.name: Daniel Ilies
basics.label: Full Stack Developer
basics.summary: Proficient Full Stack Developer skilled in developing and maintaining scalable front-end and back-end applications using JavaScript, React.js, Vue.js, Node.js, Python, and MongoDB. Experienced in designing APIs, optimizing performance, and implementing CI/CD pipelines with Git and Docker for efficient deployment. Eager to collaborate on mobile and web platforms to build engaging applications.

work.name: Bigfoot Startup
work.summary: Developed and maintained scalable front-end and back-end applications using Vue.js, Nuxt.js, and TypeScript for the AdsMedia retargeting platform.
highlights: Architected and implemented key dashboard and form components for campaign management, ensuring seamless integration with backend services
Optimized applications for maximum performance and user experience with responsive design and cross-browser compatibility
Collaborated with backend team on API integration and system design to support efficient data flow

work.name: DevelBox
work.summary: Developed front-end applications and engineered backend solutions using Vue.js, Node.js, Python, and MongoDB while collaborating with cross-functional teams.
highlights: Refactored frontend of exam management platform using Vue.js and Vuetify, optimizing performance and improving page load times by 25%
Developed AI-powered browser extension with TypeScript and TensorFlow.js for real-time functionality
Engineered RoboGPT extension using Python, OpenAI APIs, and LLMs for API integrations and real-time communication
Conducted code reviews and implemented UI/UX designs into functional web pages with HTML5, CSS3, and JavaScript

work.name: CGS Romania
work.summary: Automated customer support processes using JavaScript while troubleshooting technical issues.
highlights: Developed Otis, a JavaScript-based tool automating form-filling and email generation, resolving efficiency issues
Applied problem-solving skills in a fast-paced environment to handle diverse customer interactions

courses: Building a modern fullstack web application (Thesis)

awards.title: 1st Place Innovation Contest
awards.summary: Awarded for developing Otis, JavaScript-based automation tool for form-filling and email generation

projects.name: IT-Hub - MERN Stack Social Media Web Application

Implemented backend with Node.js, Express.js, and MongoDB for secure data management and API endpoints
Managed state with Redux and ensured performance optimization for seamless user experience
